transcript.text: ready to have your mind blown here are
five quotes by Nome Chomsky that will
make you think the more you can increase
fear of drugs and crime welfare mothers
immigrants and Aliens the more you
control all the people think about that
next time you watch the news if we don't
believe in freedom of expression for
people we despise we don't believe in it
at all true Freedom means standing up
for everyone's voice even when it's
tough optimism is a strategy for making
a better future unless you believe the

making it so stay hopeful dream big and

really learning or just

to show people how to learn for
themselves the teacher is not an

curious and let learning be a lifelong
